pages.text: × Newsletter Signup Try Our Zero Proof Libations for Dry January All News » News » Try Our Zero Proof Libations for Dry January Dry January | All Locations ALWAYS AVAILABLE PALOMA PURA agave, lime, grapefruit soda BERRY SPARKLER blueberry, house hibiscus lemonade, bubbles CIDER FIZZ spiced apple cider, lemon, cranberry, ginger ale DRY JANUARY FEATURES HIYO SELTZER social tonic with a feel-good “float” effectchoose peach mango, blackberry lemon, watermelon lime, or strawberry guava FAUX-MOSA fre alcohol removed sparkling brut, choose orange or pomegranate FRE Alcohol Removed Sparkling Brut | Californiagreen apple & pear aromas, plus crisp flavors of apple & strawberry ATHLETIC | NON-ALCOHOLIC rotating selection | 0% abv Locations may have additional non-alcoholic beverages available – please ask your server for details. × Newsletter Signup Cater Your Next Event All News » News » Cater Your Next Event Burtons Grill Catering | Available Now Just like in our restaurants, every dish on our Catering Menu is prepared from scratch with wholesome, premium ingredients. You’ll find many of our classic recipes, as well as new favorites perfect for your upcoming party & next corporate meeting, family celebration, or large-scale event. As always, we accommodate food allergies and gluten-free needs so everyone can enjoy. Together tastes better! For inquiries & personalized service, please contact us at . catering@burtonsgrill.com VIEW MENU ORDER NOW Previous Next Next

steaks are premium angus beef from allen brothers of chicago, hand-selected & grilled over an open flame. Filet Mignon* 49 8oz center cut filet, bone marrow butter, seasonal vegetable, garlic mashed potatoes NY Strip* 44 12oz new york strip, bone marrow butter, seasonal vegetable, garlic mashed potatoes Ribeye* 49 14oz 28-day aged ribeye, bone marrow butter, seasonal vegetable, garlic mashed potatoes Steak Frites* 34 chargrilled prime flat iron, chimichurri, parmesan truffle fries Burtons Classics Mediterranean Chicken Risotto 21.5 | 27.5 artichoke hearts, grape tomatoes, spinach, feta, lemon butter sauce, pesto Chicken Piccata 25.5 angel hair, spinach, capers, lemon butter sauce Chicken & Wild Mushroom Ravioli 26 pan-seared chicken, wild mushrooms, asparagus, sherry cream sauce Braised Short Ribs 34 cabernet au jus, bacon brussels sprouts, garlic mashed potatoes Pappardelle Bolognese 25.5 fresh pasta, traditional meat sauce, parmesan, italian parsley, garlic ciabatta toast Chicken Milanese Alfredo 26.5 panko-crusted chicken, rotini, english peas, parmesan cream sauce, arugula, shaved parmesan Fresh Seafood we are passionate about fresh, premium & sustainable seafood sourced locally whenever possible. Lobster Roll 35 brioche bun, french fries, coleslaw choose warm & buttered or chilled with lettuce, aioli Ahi Tuna Bowl* 28 togarashi-crusted tuna, avocado, carrots, cilantro cucumber salad, pickled red onions, sushi rice, sesame seeds, ginger & soy aioli Cajun Shrimp Pasta 26 pan-seared shrimp, bacon, rotini, artichoke hearts, english peas, cayenne parmesan cream sauce Crab Cakes 39.5 jumbo lump blue crab, whole-grain mustard beurre blanc, coleslaw, french fries Salmon Romesco* 32 bronzed salmon, fennel slaw, romesco sauce, haricots verts, roasted fingerling potatoes Crab-Crusted Haddock 38 crab cake, lemon butter sauce, seasonal vegetable, herbed jasmine rice Sides Mac & Cheese 10 French fries 7.5 GF Parmesan Truffle Fries 10.5 Sweet Potato Fries 8.5 Broccoli or Haricots Verts 7.5 Seasonal Vegetable 10 Caesar or House Salad 8.5 Garlic Mashed Potatoes 7.5 Dessert Cheesecake 11 chef’s seasonal inspiration Seven-layer Chocolate Cake 12.5 chocolate frosting, hot fudge, maldon sea salt, raspberry coulis Key Lime Pie 11.5 key lime custard, graham crust, whipped cream Affogato 10 vanilla ice cream, espresso shot, hot fudge, cacao nibs Before placing your order, please inform your server if a person in your party has a food allergy. We take the responsibility of safely serving our guests with food allergies and dietary restrictions very seriously, and we’re proud of our extensive protocols. Ask us about them! *This menu item may be served raw or undercooked. Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish, or eggs may increase the risk of foodborne illness, especially if you have certain medical conditions.

Private Dining We offer private dining at this location - . view details Catering View our , place a catering , or for more information. catering menu order online contact us Team General Manager: Emily Kearley Our restaurant in Mount Pleasant, SC is located in Mount Pleasant Towne Centre, just a few miles east of Charleston. This location is the best place to enjoy weekend brunch, Wine Wednesday, Happy Hour, seasonal outdoor dining & more in Mount Pleasant. Join us for a delicious meal in our comfortable dining room, order takeout or delivery to enjoy at home, or let us cater your next meeting or event. The Burtons Grill Mount Pleasant menu features juicy burgers, bountiful salads, tender steaks, fresh seafood & more. Our food is always made from scratch with wholesome, premium ingredients – including gluten free & allergy friendly options.
